pageContent: Purpose: Pelvic lymph node dissection represents the gold standard of lymph node staging in patients with prostate cancer. We sought to assess the effect of extended pelvic lymph node dissection on oncologic outcomes in patients with characteristics of D'Amico intermediate or high risk prostate cancer treated with radical prostatectomy.

metaData.source:
Flow cytometry as a predictive modality in prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/1563735/
